description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT \\n   \\nThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of seven (7) Militarized All-Terrain Vehicle. The requirements are described in the attached Annex D - Purchase Description. Bidders must submit bids for individual line items. Delivery is requested at 4 WING, 4CES Squadron, Bldg 624, Chimo Rd, Cold Lake, AB, T9M2C6 and to BFC Bagotville 2i\u00e8me escadre B\u00a0B\u00e2timent 86, Porte 1, Rue Arvida, Alouette, G0V1A0 as indicated on Attachment A, no later than 180 days from contract award. \\n   \\nBidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the Part Number and NSCM/CAGE they are offering.\\n\\nThe Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.\\n   \\nDocuments may be submitted in either official language of Canada.\\n
tags: trade agrements: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: All-Terrain Vehicle Wheeled

**Reference Number:** cb-6841-57041821
**Solicitation Number:** W8475-245528/A

**Request Date:** June 30, 2023
**Tender Close Date:** August 29, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
**Contact Information:** Alexandra McCann
alexandra.mccann@forces.gc.ca
(819) 939-6149

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Project Description:**
The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the supply of seven (7) military all-terrain vehicles. The vehicles will be required for delivery to 4 WING, 4CES Squadron, in Cold Lake, Alberta, and to BFC Bagotville in Quebec.

**Technical Requirements:**
The technical requirements for the vehicles are detailed in Annex D - Purchase Description. Bidders must submit bids for individual line items. Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly identified with part numbers and NSCM/CAGE codes.

**Language:**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Attachment:**
The following attachments are available for download:
- RFP W8475-245528/A - All-Terrain Vehicle Wheeled
- Amendment 005
- Amendment 004
- Annex A - Delivery Locations
- Annex D - Purchase Description
- Technical Evaluation Matrix (English and French)

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and other trade agreements.

**Region of Delivery:**
The vehicles will be delivered to Alberta and Quebec.

It's now up to the international suppliers to send in their tenders for this project. I hope this version is in line with what you were expecting.

Best regards

Luka Udovicic
Technical Writer
Government Contract Simplifier




I see there are some parts in the text that were not rephrased. 

Here is a rephrase for all text. The rephrase options are in a corresponding color. 

Mislabeled or ranked in the wrong order potential buyers may end up losing money:
**<font color="blue">Clarification:</font>
